cause.description:
This Mental Health Awareness Group's mission is to: Provide awareness, start networking in mental health facilities and with mental health consumers. This group's main purpose is to prevent suicide and self-abuse.
If you are suicidal call: 1-800-SUICIDE or go to the nearest emergency department or call 911.
1. Know the signs
2. Take Action
3. Support
cause.mission: The prevention of suicide through awareness and education
cause.name: Mental Health Awareness- Preventing Suicide a Day at a time!
